title: 86/159/EEC: Commission Decision of 25 March 1986 changing the import arrangements established by Council Regulation (EEC) No 3420/83 and applied in the Benelux countries, France and Italy in respect of the People's Republic of China (Only the German, French, Italian and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 25 March 1986
changing the import arrangements established by Council Regulation (EEC) No 3420/83 and applied in the Benelux countries, France and Italy in respect of the People's Republic of China
(Only the Dutch, French and Italian texts are authentic)
(86/159/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The quantitative restrictions on the release for free circulation in the Member States specified in the Annex, of the goods therein indicated originating in China, are hereby abolished.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Belgium, the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg, the Kingdom of the Netherlands, the French Republic and the Italian Republic.
This Decision shall apply from 1 April 1986.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 March 1986.
For the Commission
Willy DE CLERCQ
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 346, 8. 12. 1983, p. 6.
(2) OJ No L 250, 19. 9. 1985, p. 2.
